file.name: ml-service.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0

info:
  title: Machine Learning Service Structure
  contact:
    name: Abdullah Zaiter
    email: abdu.zaiter@gmail.com
  version: 1.0.0

components:
  securitySchemes:
    bearerAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT
    basicAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: basic

paths:
  /resource/init:
    get:
      tags:
        - Init & Predict
      security:
        - bearerAuth: [ ]
      description: ""
      summary: Init and Train
      operationId: Init and Train
      parameters:
        - in: query
          name: async
          schema:
            type: boolean
          description: If you want to init and train the service asynchronously
      responses:
        '202':
          description: 'Init was requested and the task was submitted, to check the task status use the operation TaskStatus'
          headers:
            Location:
              schema:
                type: string
              description: URL to check the task status
        '204':
          description: 'Init and train ran successfully'
        '401':
          description: 'Bearer auth token error'
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status:
                    type: string
                example:
                  status: Invalid or expired token
        '500':
          description: 'Error initializing the service'
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status:
                    type: string
                example:
                  status: "Error: database is offline"
      deprecated: false

  /resource/auth:
    get:
      tags:
        - Authentication
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      description: "In the Basic Auth email should be valid and from **gmail.com** domain"
      summary: GenerateToken
      operationId: GenerateToken
      parameters: [ ]
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 'Token generated successfully'
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  token:
                    type: string
                example:
                  token: "c0eb7903452d4bd6b76793209255ef2c"
        '401':
          description: 'Basic auth validation error'
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status:
                    type: string
                example:
                  status: Bad username or password
      deprecated: false

  /resource/predict:
    post:
      tags:
        - Init & Predict
      security:
        - bearerAuth: [ ]
      description: ""
      summary: Predict or Estimate
      operationId: Predict or Estimate
      parameters: [ ]
      requestBody:
        description: ''
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              example:
                mocked_json: "mocked_value"
        required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 'Prediction ran successfully'
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  current_random:
                    type: integer
                  current_post_json:
                    type: object
                  last_post_json:
                    type: object
                  last_random:
                    type: integer
                example:
                  current_random: 42
                  current_post_json:
                    mocked_json: "mocked_value"
                  last_post_json:
                    mocked_last_json: "mocked_last_value"
                  last_random: 24
        '401':
          description: 'Bearer auth token error'
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status:
                    type: string
                example:
                  status: Invalid or expired token
        '424':
          description: 'Init has not been called or ran with errors'
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status:
                    type: string
                example:
                  status: "Did you call init the service"
        '500':
          description: "Generic error"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status:
                    type: string
                example:
                  status: "Error: prediction failed"
      deprecated: false

  /resource/task/status/{task_id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - Task Status
      security:
        - bearerAuth: [ ]
      description: "Check the status of a given task"
      summary: "Check task status"
      operationId: TaskStatus
      parameters:
        - in: path
          required: true
          name: task_id
          schema:
            type: string
          description: "The task id received when you called init with async option"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 'Bearer auth token error'
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  done:
                    type: boolean
                  status:
                    type: string
                example:
                  done: false
                  status: "In progress..."
      deprecated: false
tags:
  - name: Authentication
    description: Basic Auth call to obtain Bearer Token
  - name: Init & Predict
    description: Machine Learning service usage
  - name: Task Status
    description: In case of Async usage
